3.3.1.2. d1client.DataONEClient¶

class d1client.DataONEClient(cnBaseUrl='http://cn.dataone.org/cn/', credentials={})¶
__init__(cnBaseUrl='http://cn.dataone.org/cn/', credentials={})¶

Methods

__init__(cnBaseUrl='http://cn.dataone.org/cn/', credentials={})
create(targetNodeId=None)¶
get(pid)¶

Returns a stream open for reading that returns the bytes of the object identified by PID. :return type: HTTPResponse

getAuthToken(forcenew=False)¶

Returns an authentication token using the credentials provided when this client was instantiated.

Return type:AuthToken
getData(pid)¶
getObjects(pids)¶
getRelatedObjects(pid)¶
Return type:list of DataONEObject
getScienceMetadata(pid)¶

Retrieve the pid for science metadata object for the specified PID. If PID refers to a science metadata object, then that object is returned.

getSystemMetadata(pid)¶
isData(pid)¶

Returns True is pid refers to a data object.

Determine this by looking at the describes property of the system metadata.

isScienceMetadata(pid)¶

return True if pid refers to a science metadata object

listObjects(start=0, count=10)¶
resolve(pid)¶
Return type:list of baseurl
